document.full_text: iran's constitutional watchdog has found president mahmoud ahmadinejad's decision to appoint himself caretaker oil minister illegal, the semi-official fars news agency said on friday.
document.title: iran watchdog says ahmadinejad oil ministry move illegal
lines_and_colors: iran's constitutional watchdog has found president mahmoud ahmadinejad's decision to appoint himself caretaker oil minister illegal, the semi-official fars news agency said on friday.
